text: This product is pure, unrefined. It's fresh and can be used in so may different things. I've used it in cooking and baking, I use it in my hair, my skin as well as taking a teaspoon of it daily. You really get a lot for  your money. Without a doubt, I  will  order this again. The seller even included a letter...which i s very personable. They not only want to see you a product, they have your best interest at heart!
